title: Super Deluxe poster
credit_line:
Thiagarajan Kumararaja, India, 2019

Courtesy Tyler Durden and Kino Fist
brief_description: “No other filmmaker has romanticised the Tamil cinema universe with pop culture references as much as Kumararaja,” wrote film critic Srivatsan S for The Hindu. A darkly comedic thriller, Thiagarajan Kumararaja’s 2019 feature Super Deluxe swept the international film festival circuit and fascinated audiences with its ambitious visual style. “Thiagarajan Kumararaja’s unstable mix of dark comedy, brutal thriller and Douglas Sirkian melodrama is shamelessly excessive but undeniably entertaining,” said Variety. Kumararaja’s first film in eight years, Super Deluxe wove together four different stories, all depicted with an amazingly vivid colour palette.
